LStrings.EN: CCA added to Custom Actor List
LStrings.ZH: 已添加到自定义玩家目录中

LStrings.EN: CCA was added to the Ark-Nucleus curated Custom Actor List. With this, this CCA is accessible to Ark-Nucleus for communication.
LStrings.ZH: 被添加到Ark-Nucleus策划的定制玩家名单中.通过这种方式，Ark-Nucleus可以访问该CCA进行通信.

LStrings.EN: CCA Actor was destroyed. Reason being: __0__.
CCA has finished setting things up and is ready for communication.
LStrings.ZH: 已完成设置，并准备好进行通信.

LStrings.EN: Extracted Mod folder name from class
LStrings.ZH: 从目录中提取Mod文件夹名称

LStrings.EN: Successfully extracted Mod folder name (ModUID) from the class file __0__.
LStrings.ZH: 已成功从目录文件__0__中提取Mod文件夹名称（ModUID）.

LStrings.EN: Failed to get Mod folder name
Failed to get Mod folder name (ModUID) from the PGD file __0__.
LStrings.ZH: 无法从PGD文件__0__获取Mod文件夹名称（ModUID）.

LStrings.EN: Added UIBuff on a new possessed character for player __0__.
LStrings.ZH: 为玩家__0__添加了一个新附身角色的UIBuff.

LStrings.EN: Added UIBuff on a new spawned player(__0__).
LStrings.ZH: 在一个新的玩家身上增加了UIBuff（__0__）.

LStrings.EN: Added UIBuff to all online players.
LStrings.ZH: 将UIBuff添加到所有在线玩家.
已加载所有原版物品目录
已成功加载__0__原版物品目录.
已完成对原版物品目录的处理

LStrings.EN: Finished processing __0__ loaded PrimalItem Classes and replicating them to the client.
LStrings.ZH: 已完成处理__0__加载的原版物品目录并将其复制到客户端.
已完成恐龙目录的处理

LStrings.EN: Finished processing __0__ loaded Dino Classes and replicating them to the client.
LStrings.ZH: 已完成__0__恐龙目录的加载并将其复制到客户端.

LStrings.EN: User input detection enabled for UIBuff.
LStrings.ZH: 为UIBuff启用了用户输入检测.

LStrings.EN: One Place to configure them all!
Please consider joining Ark-Nucleus Discord and share your feedback on this feature or ask for help if you have a hard time understanding how to use it.
LStrings.ZH: 如果你可以登录discord，请考虑加入【Ark-Nucleus】discord频道分享你的反馈，如果你很难理解如何使用它，并且无法使用discord，请加入中文QQ群：316452283.

LStrings.EN: Mod specific logs can be found here (This is an opt-in feature for Nucleus compatible mods). The logs are separated into client side logs and server logs avaible for server admins only. By default, max. number of logs that is loaded and can be searched is 400 (2 log files). To load more files, click on the the logs options button found in the top right corenr of the Logs View.
LStrings.ZH: Mod特定的日志可以在这里找到(这是【Ark-Nucleus】兼容Mod的一个可选功能).日志分为客户端日志和服务器日志，仅供服务器管理员使用.默认情况下,最多加载并可搜索的日志数量为400(2个日志文件).要加载更多文件，请单击日志查看右上角的日志选项按钮.

LStrings.EN: Clear old server side logs to improve load times.
LStrings.DE: Lösche alte Server-Logs um die Ladezeiten zu verbessern.
LStrings.ZH: 清除旧的服务器日志以缩短加载时间.

LStrings.EN: Clear old client side logs to improve your first time spawning on a server.
LStrings.ZH: 清除旧的客户端日志，以改善您在服务器上的第一次生成.

LStrings.EN: Clear logs older than X days:
LStrings.DE: Lösche Logs älter als X Tage:

LStrings.EN: The minimum value is 7 days to ensure that there is always an adequate number of logs in case of issues.
LStrings.DE: Der Mindestwert liegt bei 7 Tagen um sicher zu stellen, dass im Falle eines Problems genug Logs zur Verfügung stehen.
LStrings.ZH: 最小值为7天，以确保在出现问题时始终有足够数量的日志.

LStrings.EN: Amount of log files to be loaded into the game (Logs View)
LStrings.DE: Anzahl der Logdateien, die in das Spiel geladen werden sollen (Logs Ansicht)
LStrings.ZH: 要加载到游戏中的日志文件量（日志视图）

LStrings.EN: Be careful with using bigger number as it may result in server lag whenever you open the Logs View as it needs to send all the log data to your client (may disconnect you).
LStrings.ZH: 请小心避免使用过大的数字，因为每当您打开日志视图时，它可能会导致服务器延迟，因为它需要将所有日志数据发送到您的客户端（可能会断开您的连接）.
客户端日志文件的数量：

LStrings.EN: To big of a number may result in short game freezes when opening the Logs View.
LStrings.ZH: 当打开“日志”视图时，数字过大可能会导致短时间的游戏卡顿.

LStrings.EN: The log system is one of the optional systems that a mod can integrate with and offer a much easier overview of things happening in the back and help debug when something goes wrong.
LStrings.ZH: 日志系统是一个可选的系统，Mod可以与之集成，并提供一个更简单的关于后面发生的事情的概述，并在出现问题时帮助调试.

LStrings.EN: The system can handle large amount of logs without impacting the stability of a server or client by splitting logs in multiple files (200 logs per file).
LStrings.ZH: 通过将日志拆分为多个文件（每个文件200个日志），系统可以处理大量日志，而不会影响服务器或客户端的稳定性.

LStrings.EN: Logs by default are stored in "/Saved/SaveGames/SESSION_NAME/ServerOrClient/MOD_NAME/Logs/x.sav" where each x.sav contains up to 200 log items, and by default, only the last two files are loaded into the memory and are displayed in the Logs View.
LStrings.ZH: 默认情况下，日志存储在/Saved/SaveGames/SESSION_NAME/ServerOrClient/MOD_NAME/Logs/x.sav”中，其中每个x.sav文件最多包含200个日志项，默认情况下，只有最后两个文件加载到内存中并显示在日志视图中.

LStrings.EN: In case of an issue with a Nucleus compatible mod, it is safe to send this log files to the mod author to help them in understanding what may have happened to produce such issue.
LStrings.ZH: 如果与Ark-Nucleus兼容的Mod出现问题，可以安全地将此日志文件发送给Mod作者，以帮助他们了解产生此类问题的原因.

LStrings.EN: Server logs are stored on the server and are not visible to normal players as they may contain data that's only for the eyes of an Admin.
LStrings.ZH: 服务器日志存储在服务器上，普通玩家无法看到，因为它们可能包含只供管理员查看的数据.

LStrings.EN: Client logs are stored on the players own pc and are only available to them.
LStrings.DE: Client-Logs werden nur auf dem PC des Spielers gespeichert und sind nur für diesen verfügbar.
LStrings.ZH: 客户端日志存储在玩家自己的电脑上，仅对他们可用.
正在清除服务器旧日志...
已完成清除服务器旧日志.

LStrings.EN: Number of log files to load changed
LStrings.DE: Anzahl der zu ladenden Logs geändert
LStrings.ZH: 要加载的日志文件数已更改

LStrings.EN: Successfully changed the number of log file segments to load into the memory.
LStrings.ZH: 已成功更改要加载到内存中的日志文件段数.

LStrings.EN: Normal mode will disable your master admin permissions and apply the set permissions in the Server Settings of Ark-Nuclues.
LStrings.ZH: 正常模式将禁用您的主管理权限，并应用Ark-Nuclues服务器设置中的设置权限

LStrings.EN: Master admin view unlocks all features and ignores the permissions set in the Server Settings of Ark-Nucleus.
LStrings.ZH: 主管理视图解锁所有功能，并忽略Ark-Nucleus服务器设置中设置的权限.
与无人操作刷取一起使用（很快）

LStrings.EN: The dino catalog can be used to learn more about the dinos on a Server, be it vanilla dinos or modded, we got them all. Use the 3D preview to see how a dino would look like with different color combinations and if you have the permissions spawn such a dino on to the map or change some global settings for them if availible.
LStrings.ZH: 恐龙目录可以用来了解更多关于服务器上恐龙的信息，无论是原版恐龙还是Mod恐龙，我们都有.使用3D预览可以查看恐龙在不同颜色组合下的外观，如果您有权限，可以在地图上生成这样的恐龙，或者更改一些全局设置（如果可用）.

LStrings.EN: Modded Dinos shows ONLY Dinos inclueded by the selected mod. To view all availible dinos (Modded & Vanilla), access the Dino Catalog found in the "Server Info" Pages Section if not disabled by your Server Admin(s).
LStrings.ZH: 恐龙模型仅显示所选Mod包含的恐龙.要查看所有可用的恐龙（Mod和原版），请访问“服务器信息”页面中的恐龙目录（如果服务器管理员未禁用）.

LStrings.EN: The dino catalog can be used to discover all the dinos in the game, used or hidden unfinished dinos.
LStrings.ZH: 恐龙目录可以用来发现游戏中所有的恐龙，使用或隐藏未完成的恐龙.

LStrings.EN: If using the catalog inisde the "Mod Hub", only dinos added by the currently selected mod ar shown.
LStrings.ZH: 如果在Mod中心使用目录，则仅显示当前所选Mod添加的恐龙

LStrings.EN: If a dino has settings that can be changed using Nucleus, a new "Settings" button will appear beside the"Spawn" button.
LStrings.ZH: 如果恐龙有可以使用Nucleus更改的设置，则在“刷取”按钮旁边会出现一个新的“设置”按钮.
关于该物品的一般信息：

LStrings.EN: The item catalog can be used to learn more about the items on a Server, be it vanilla items or modded, we got them all. Use the 3D preview to see how a item looks like with different color combinations and if you have the permissions spawn such a item to your inventory or change some global settings for them if availible.
LStrings.ZH: 物品目录可以用来了解更多关于服务器上物品的信息，无论是普通物品还是Mod物品，我们都有.使用3D预览查看不同颜色组合的物品外观，以及您是否有权限将此类物品添加到您的背包中，或者在可用的情况下更改它们的一些全局设置.

LStrings.EN: Modded Items shows ONLY Items inclueded by the selected mod. To view all availible items (Modded & Vanilla), access the Items Catalog found in the "Server Info" Pages Section if not disabled by your Server Admin(s).
LStrings.ZH: Mod物品显示只有选定的Mod包含的物品.要查看所有可用的物品(Mod和原版)，访问物品目录中发现的“服务器信息”页面部分，如果您的服务器管理员没有禁用.

LStrings.EN: The item catalog can be used to discover all the items in the game, used or hidden unfinished items.
LStrings.ZH: 物品目录可以用来发现游戏中所有的物品，使用或隐藏的未完成的物品.

LStrings.EN: If using the catalog inisde the "Mod Hub", only items added by the currently selected mod ar shown.
LStrings.ZH: 如果在“Mod中心”内使用目录，仅显示当前所选Mod添加的物品.

LStrings.EN: If a item has settings that can be changed using Nucleus, a new "Settings" button will appear beside the"Spawn" button.
LStrings.ZH: 如果某个物品的设置可以使用Nucleus进行更改，则“刷取”按钮旁边会出现一个新的“设置”按钮.

LStrings.EN: Mod specific localization strings can be found here (This is an opt-in feature for Nucleus compatible mods). The localization strings are provided by the mod dev or auto generated if an unknown string passes trough the translation layer and is made available for users to translate. You can import localization or share your own custom translation with others. Translations of the same mod are shared across all servers and single player sessions you play.
LStrings.ZH: 可在此处找到特定于Mod的本土化内容（这是Ark-Nucleus兼容Mod的可选功能）.本地化字符串由Mod开发者提供，或者在未知字符串通过翻译时自动生成，供用户翻译.您可以导入本土化或与他人共享自己的自定义翻译.同一个Mod的翻译在所有服务器和单人游戏中共享.

LStrings.EN: The map is a powerful tool for player and admins alike. Depending on the settings, it can allow players to have their own personal and/or tribe shared mapping data or access the global map data managed by the Roles with the correct permission tags.
LStrings.ZH: 地图对于玩家和管理员来说都是一个强大的工具.根据设置，它可以允许玩家拥有自己的个人和/或部落共享地图数据，或使用正确的权限标签访问由玩家管理的全局地图数据.

LStrings.EN: Dino spawn options are INVALID! Make sure you allocated all the availible status points.
LStrings.ZH: 恐龙刷取选项无效！确保分配了所有可用的属性点.

LStrings.EN: Quality is used to scale the craft and repar costs of the item.
LStrings.ZH: 品质用于衡量物品的工艺和修复成本.

LStrings.EN: Quality Index changes only the visual quality indicators of the item (color & name).
LStrings.ZH: 品质指数仅更改物品的可见信息（颜色和名称）.

LStrings.EN: Import only for the selected mod?
LStrings.DE: Nur für die ausgewählte Mod importieren?

LStrings.EN: You can import localization for multiple mods at once by un-checking this box.
LStrings.DE: Du kannst die Lokalisierung für mehrere Mods auf einmal importieren, in dem du die Box deaktivierst.
LStrings.ZH: 通过取消选中此框，可以一次导入多个Mod的本地化.

LStrings.EN: Keep in mind that only XX-User translations are imported and will overwrite any of your overlapping custom translations.
LStrings.ZH: 请记住，只导入XX个用户翻译，并将覆盖任何重叠的自定义翻译.

LStrings.EN: Export only for the selected mod?
LStrings.DE: Nur für die ausgewählte Mod exportieren?

LStrings.EN: You can export localization for multiple mods at once by un-checking this box.
LStrings.DE: Du kannst die Lokalisierung für mehrere Mods auf einmal exportieren, in dem du die Box deaktivierst.
LStrings.ZH: 通过取消选中此框，可以一次导出多个Mod的本地化.

LStrings.EN: Include English string into the exported Json to be used as reference for translations.
LStrings.ZH: 将英语字符串包含到导出的Json中，作为翻译的参考.

LStrings.EN: Use this generated string to share your custom translation with others or to generate an empty translation template that can be sent to someone for translation.
LStrings.ZH: 使用此生成的字符串与其他人共享自定义翻译，或生成可发送给他人进行翻译的空翻译模板.

LStrings.EN: The localization system is one of the optional systems that a mod can integrate with and make the mod more accessible to non-english speaking players.
LStrings.ZH: 本地化系统是Mod可以集成的可选系统之一，使非英语玩家更容易使用Mod.

LStrings.EN: A mod can provide translations to as many languages as they want or just provide the native language and leave it to players to translate it to their languages and share translations with each other.
LStrings.ZH: Mod可以提供多种语言的翻译，或者只提供母语，让玩家将其翻译成自己的语言，并相互分享翻译结果.

LStrings.EN: Even if a translation is provided by the mod dev, users can still add custom translations for that language if they are not satisfied with th provided translation.
LStrings.ZH: 即使Mod开发者提供了翻译，如果用户对提供的翻译不满意，仍然可以为该语言添加自定义翻译.

LStrings.EN: In case that a mod author used a string for which they didn't provide any translation, an auto entry will be generated at the moment that string is displayed somewhere and will be available for translation. If the player has the localization view open at that time, a refresh will be needed for the auto entry to appear in the list.
LStrings.ZH: 如果Mod作者使用了一个他们没有提供任何翻译的字符串，那么当该字符串显示在某个地方时，将自动生成一个条目，并可用于翻译.如果玩家当时打开了本地化视图，则需要刷新一次以使自动条目出现在目录中.

LStrings.EN: IMPORTANT: Localization saves are not bound to a session, which means, a translation of a mod will be shared by all server you play one and your single player session.
LStrings.ZH: 重要提示：本地化保存不绑定到登录，这意味着，一个Mod的翻译将由您玩的所有服务器和单人登录共享.

LStrings.EN: WARNING: This will remove the custom translation for all languages related to this item.
LStrings.ZH: 警告：这将删除与此项目相关的所有语言的自定义翻译.

LStrings.EN: Removing all custom translations for an unused auto generated entry will make sure it doesn't get saved anymore and with that will disappear from the list after a game restart.
LStrings.ZH: 删除未使用的自动生成条目的所有自定义翻译将确保该条目不再保存，并且在重新启动游戏后，该条目将从目录中消失.

LStrings.EN: As localization is shared between sessions, removing a custom translation here will remove it for all servers you play on as well as your single player session.
LStrings.ZH: 由于本地化是在登录间共享的，因此在此处删除自定义翻译将删除您所玩的所有服务器以及单人会话的自定义翻译.

LStrings.EN: Custom translation was successfuly forwarded to the mod(s). In case of issues, check the logs of the mod in question.
LStrings.ZH: 自定义翻译已成功发送到Mod.如果出现问题，请查看相关Mod的日志.

LStrings.EN: Changes to localization were successfuly sent to the mod in question.
LStrings.ZH: 对本地化的更改已成功发送给相关Mod

LStrings.EN: Some of the cool mods that have added support for Ark-Nucleus.
LStrings.ZH: 一些好玩的Mod增加了对Ark Nucleus的支持.

LStrings.EN: Mod specific settings can be found here (This is an opt-in feature for Nucleus compatible mods). The settings are split in Server Wide Settings (only accessible to the Master Admin), Server Player Setting and Client Player Settings(stored localy on their pc, usefull for toggling UI elements and other features that don't affect other players).
LStrings.ZH: 可在此处找到特定于Mod的设置（这是Nucleus兼容Mod的可选功能）.这些设置分为服务器范围的设置（只有主管理员可以访问）、服务器玩家设置和客户端玩家设置（本地存储在其电脑上，用于切换UI元素和其他不影响其他玩家的功能）.

LStrings.EN: The configuration system allows mods to expose their settings to be managed by the Nucleus UI and make them more accessible and easy to chang at runtime.
LStrings.ZH: 配置系统允许Mod公开其设置，由Nucleus UI管理，并使其在运行时更易于访问和更改.

LStrings.EN: 1.) Server Wide Settings - Managed by the Master Admin and poeple that were given access to it. This settings are stored on the server and are mostly used for global server wide settings (settings that normaly go in the .ini config file).
LStrings.ZH: 1.）服务器范围的设置——由主管理员和被授予访问权限的用户管理.这些设置存储在服务器上，主要用于全局服务器范围的设置（通常在.ini配置文件中设置）.

LStrings.EN: 2.) Server Player Settings - Managed by the Player in question,Master Admin and poeple that were given access to it. This settings are stored on the server as well but are unique to each player. This are the player settings that could affect other players or some server side logic. (An example would be toggling of visual elements on the character that can be seend by other players as well).
LStrings.ZH: 2.）服务器玩家设置——由相关玩家、主管理员和被授予访问权限的用户管理.这些设置也存储在服务器上，但对每个玩家都是唯一的.这是可能影响其他玩家或某些服务器端逻辑的玩家设置.（例如，切换角色上的视觉元素，其他玩家也可以看到）.

LStrings.EN: 3.) Client Player Settings - Managed by the Player in question only. This settings are stored on the players PC and are not accessible to the server if not manualy replicated. This are the player settings that affect only the player in question and have no impact on other players or the server. (An example would be toggling of UI elements that are only visible to the player).
LStrings.ZH: 3.）客户端玩设置-仅由相关玩家管理.这些设置存储在玩家电脑上，如果不手动复制，服务器将无法访问.这是仅影响相关玩家的玩家设置，对其他玩家或服务器没有影响.（例如，切换仅对玩家可见的UI元素）.

LStrings.EN: Unable to spawn dino, make sure owner is online and the dino spawn location is a valid one (water for waterdinos, enough room for big dino to spawn).
LStrings.ZH: 无法刷取恐龙，请确保玩家处于在线状态，并且恐龙刷取位置有效（海洋生物需要在水中，大型恐龙需要更大的空间）.

LStrings.EN: Dino was successfully spawned on the map.
LStrings.ZH: 恐龙在地图上成功刷取.
恐龙已加入到低温舱中

LStrings.EN: Dino was successfully Cryoed and given to Owner.
LStrings.ZH: 恐龙加入低温舱并发送给目标.

LStrings.EN: Failed to spawn and cryo dino!
Something whent wrong while trying to spawn and cryo the dino. Make sure owner is online and the dino is a walid cryo targer.
LStrings.ZH: 在试图刷取和冷冻恐龙时出错了，确保目标是在线以及是可加入低温舱的恐龙

LStrings.EN: A new item was successfully spawned and given to the Owner.
LStrings.ZH: 物品刷取成功并发送给目标

LStrings.EN: Failed to spawn a new item and give it to Owner. Check if owner is still online.
LStrings.ZH: 未能刷取物品并将其发送给目标，检查目标是否仍在线.

LStrings.EN: Finished processing __0__ PrimalItems out of __1__ total!
LStrings.ZH: 在__0__件物品中处理__1__件原版物品

LStrings.EN: Finished processing __0__ Dinos out of __1__ total!
LStrings.ZH: 在__0__只恐龙中处理__1__只恐龙

LStrings.EN: Failed to add to Spawn Queue
Failed to add a spawn request to the spawn queue.
LStrings.ZH: 添加刷取请求到刷取队列失败。

LStrings.EN: Spawn request dropped because of an missing BluePrint path.
LStrings.ZH: 由于缺少蓝图路径，刷取请求被放弃。
刷取失败 - 未知类型

LStrings.EN: Spawn request dropped because of an unknown BluePrint type.
LStrings.ZH: 由于未知蓝图类型，已删除刷取请求。
